original_text: The Lord your God will bless you in the land that he is giving to you. But perhaps there will be a poor person among the Israelites in one of your towns. Then do not refuse to help him. Do not think only about yourself.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주신 땅 어느 성읍에서든지 가난한 형제가 너와 함께 거주하거든 그 가난한 형제에게 네 마음을 완악하게 하지 말며 네 손을 움켜 쥐지 말고

sentences.original_text: The Lord your God will bless you
sentences.korean_translation: 주 너의 하나님께서 너를 복 주실 것이다

sentences.original_text: that he is giving to you
But perhaps there will be a poor person
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 아마 가난한 사람이 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: Then do not refuse to help him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그를 도와주는 것을 거절하지 말라

sentences.original_text: Do not think only about yourself
